function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Uber's policy of inclusiveness and sharing of information may contribute to the spread of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion in local communities and among taxi operators.","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene and safety protocols for drivers, passengers, and food delivery personnel. Provide resources and support for local health initiatives.","Technologies":"Contactless delivery technology, real-time health tracking apps, and AI-powered crowd management systems.","People":"Taxi operators, drivers, passengers, local communities.","Owner":"Uber, local governments, health organizations."},{"Description":"Shelter at home policies and social distancing challenges have impacted Uber's business model, potentially contributing to the spread of contagion as people seek alternative transportation options.","Impact":"Decreased adherence to social distancing guidelines, increased risk of exposure to contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Promote and incentivize adherence to social distancing guidelines. Implement stringent sanitation measures for vehicles and delivery services.","Technologies":"Sanitization technology for vehicles, GPS tracking for social distancing compliance, and communication platforms for promoting guidelines.","People":"Uber drivers, passengers, delivery personnel, local communities.","Owner":"Uber, local governments, public health agencies."},{"Description":"Uber's decision to deliver food from small restaurants free of charge may lead to increased demand and activity, creating challenges in maintaining safe and hygienic operations.","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion due to higher volume of deliveries and interactions.","Mitigation":"Implement additional sanitation and safety procedures for food preparation and delivery. Provide training and resources to restaurant staff and delivery personnel.","Technologies":"Food safety monitoring systems, contactless delivery technology, and sanitation equipment.","People":"Restaurant staff, delivery personnel, end customers.","Owner":"Uber, small restaurants, public health agencies."}]}
